properties.entry: SELECT NOTICE_NO , NOTICE_TITLE , USER_ID , COUNT , CREATE_DATE FROM NOTICE N JOIN TB_USER USING (USER_NO) WHERE N.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC
UPDATE NOTICE SET COUNT = COUNT+1 WHERE NOTICE_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT NOTICE_NO , NOTICE_TITLE , NOTICE_CONTENT , USER_ID , CREATE_DATE FROM NOTICE JOIN TB_USER USING (USER_NO) WHERE NOTICE_NO = ?
SELECT FAQ_NO , CATEGORY , FAQ_TITLE , FAQ_CONTENT FROM FAQ WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND WHO = 'U' ORDER BY FAQ_NO DESC
SELECT Q_NO , Q_TITLE , TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "CREATE_DATE" , STATUS FROM QUESTION WHERE Q_WHO = 'U' AND A_WHO = 'R' ORDER BY Q_NO DESC
SELECT Q_NO , Q_TITLE , TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "CREATE_DATE" , STATUS FROM QUESTION WHERE Q_WHO = 'U' AND A_WHO = 'A' ORDER BY Q_NO DESC
